Product is very good. Noise level is super low and wash quality is excellent. However installation service is something Bosch can work on.

Hi, I bought this during mid of covid second wave in India, Ofcourse due to restrictions Bosch people were not able to install, I had to get someone from Urban Company to do it, while they helped online, which is fine.The product is very good quality one and no noise and so silent.Just a week around Dussehra, we had a small short circuit due to apartment transformer issue which burnt the wire of washing machine. Technician came immediately and checked and said it will take 3 days. We requested if they can close it before Dussehra, they said it will take 3 days. After 3 days we did not see anyone coming, we called on 4 th day, now they added 2 more days to cover their weekend time as well and said, it will come on Monday.The problem with Bosch service is its company owned unlike IFB which gives it to third party.Here third parties compete to provide you service, where as Bosch service people will take their own sweet time if there are holidays are around.Think about this before buying this product.
Very good product only thing is your water pressure in tap connected to it should be good overall I love it

Product is perfect and noise levels are pretty low. Hardly you will notice that it is running in the wash mode which is primarily due to the inverter motor. We had IFB for a long time and was looking for a replacement with inverter motor and purchased this one.About VECARE free installation service. Trust me - They should be named as "Don't Care" for the pathetic service which I never got and only messages stating that site is not ready. Till date they never ever called to check whether the installation was done or not. Once the product is delivered, without wasting a minute, call up Bosch and schedule a free & professional installation service. Amazon completely let me down here that you were happily seeing the reschedules and never bothered to check whether the installation was done or not. I know it is a fulfilled service but cant be unattended and there is no contact number or an escalation # provided for Vcare other than the technician who never bothered to return the call.Word of caution: Pls don't try to run the machine without the technician as the drum is locked for safety purposes which is mentioned in the manual. I was about to do that mistake because the technician never turned up but luckily read the manual and waited.Overall, good product and working well!!
A breeze to use

My experience has been good overall with this washing machine. However there is something important you should know regarding the repairability.After 4-5 years if the drum gets damaged due to any reason then, Bosch will only replace the complete drum instead of repairing it at a cost of rs.10,000/- to 14,000/- because it is a sealed drum that cannot be disassembled. My friend faced this issue and has to replace the shock absorbers, drum and related parts for a total of Rs.15KIt seems these companies were fined by the EU to stop making sealed drums that Cannot be repaired.Online reviews suggest LG makes repairable drums. Though I like Bosch as a brand and the overall quality of the washing machine is good I would not recommend purchasing it, if it is very expensive to repair.Now I am just hoping that I do not face this problem in the future.

    ¬†I am writing this review after 3 days of using.Addition things required for this machine if you have been using front load washin machine or you are going to purchase new washing machine first time. Things like new two way tap for machine filter. This machine needs filter which can only be use through new tap connection. You need plumbing services for this. Secondly company provides only 1m pipe so if yor distance between tap and washing machine is more the  you required brand new pipe from bosh which cost around Rs 950. Third is discal liquid for drum clean. Its mandatory because executive from bosh said after three wash you need to clean drum for first time then you can clean after 4 to 5 months frequency, but its cost around Rs 2500 and last but not least no other washing machine stand is suitable for this heavy machine and specially wheel based stand. You need only OG stand which company provides which cost around Rs 3000.
Too much noise when spinning

The machine is being used at two places by my relatives with very good reviews. Hence I went ahead and purchased the same. However the technician who came to install declared that the machine won‚Äôt run at my first floor apartment due to low water pressure. He recommended installing a booster pump (some additional 7-8k) for proper operation of the machine. Now I was stuck with a defunct machine which was brand new but won‚Äôt run at my particular apartment.I contacted Amazon customer care regarding this issue, who initially refused to return the device. Next they informed me regarding visit by an Amazon technician who would certify that tha water pressure was actually low for operation and gave me a window of 4-6 days.Unfortunately nobody turned up from Amazon‚Äôs side and the return window was about to close. On contacting them again via telephone, the customer support team understood my problem and helped initiate the return process. The matter was handled very well by the Amazon support team and my machine was successfully returned.I appreciate the professional support provided by Amazon in this matter and the standard of their great support team.For all reading this review, please get water pressure measured by a qualified technician before you order the machine. Bosch machines have this peculiar requirement which may pose a problem to potential customers.I thank the Amazon team for their professional support in my case.

Product received in good condition. Package super. The Bosch Service Executivegave demonstration of the machine which is very easy to understand. No noise problem. Only the sound is heard which could not be avoided. Only we have to select the program and place the laundry inside the machine and the liquid. Really the washing work done by the machine is excellent. It's very easy to use because of the various programmes depending upon the laundry. Eventhough the water is somewhat hard, because of the inbuilt heater available in the machine, the dirt removed thoroughly and the clothes looks shining. Thanks to Bosch for their inventory adopted in this washing machine.

I tell u honestly, market is flooded with autom machines, at huge marketing gimmicks, don't fall for it, Bosch technology is apar, from other manufacturers, the noise level is so calm, that sometimes we even forget that machine is running, until the final alarm buzzes.Washing is so easy to operate as per indian mothers, it's very very easy to remember and operate..no confusion at all.Quality of washing is very neat, do as per the modes given, bt one advice always keep the rpm at 800-1000, for cloth quality to be long life ..Consumption of watr and electricity is bery less as compared to our last LG semi automatic machine.IM IN LOVE WITH BOSCH , PLANNING TO PURCHASE THE DISHWASHER TOO...ALL THE BEST . Declaration: I didn't buy it from Amazon. Brought it from authorized dealer in my local.Good things: Low noise, smooth.Bad things: low water pressure error. This model is definitely have some design problem. Not well suitable for Indian home water system. Even Bosh website and machine manual says10 liters per minute is sufficient to get it operated, but in reality it is not. I have more than 12 liters per min flow at my tap, water tank installed above 15 feelt from ground still facing low water pressure. This causes more cleaning time that defined for cycle. All cycles do not complete in given time.In short : if you are having overhead tank for water supply which is less than 15 feet heigh, don't go for Bosh series 4, 7 kg front load. May be you can think of lower kg ot alternate brand suitable for Indian household plumbing with over head tank.

Want to caution here innocent buyers looking at number of stars given with no doubt the good performance BUT Bosch have made the drum sealed so you cannot service a bearing or spider arm replacement but have to replace the complete drum, my 6kg machine bought in Amazon for Rs.16k I thought was wonderful deal only to be cheated by Bosch in 3 years the drum needed to be replaced because it cannot be service as it is moulded/pasted two halves and cannot be split easily to enable service.  They have cunningly designed the machine nice but to keep up their returns by service, this is like printers where you pay small price for whole printer but huge price for ink. Please check first if the drum can be servived before buying washing machine. I feel cheated and will never go to Bosch again.

Using this machine since 3 years now. The product is really good and I had no issues with it. But I must say Bosch has a pathetic customer service. The knob of my machine got damaged and asked for repair in end May 2021. Till date the part is not repaired. It's been months. Moreover, what they keep doing is one POC gives the contact of other and it keeps happening and the issue does not get solved. I recommend not to buy products from Bosch. There are other companies in market with good products and better customer service.

So yes, lets talk about hits first:1. Good washing quality2. Quite a few washing options3. Good Build quality4. Less noise level5. Temperature settingMisses:1. Amazon installation service is a biggest letdown. Didn't turned up on sceduled time and date and ultimately have to self call Bosch service center to fix appointment. I have spent my 2 days explaining this issue to Customer care but even then noone turned up on said date. Its better to either buy product offline or call Bosch customer care for installation. Bosch installation team came the next day, so that's the good part.2. Their accessories are quite expensive, so it's upto u if you buy from outside. I bought directly from them (stand) as build qualityu of the stand was good. Bosch can lower the accessories price, so that's a miss.3. I felt built quality, especially upper part just average. Reason , at first when i received this product, it was damaged from upper part. And it can be easily pressed if u put any heavy pressure. Although, machine weight is quite heavy but that may be because drum and motor.4. Inlet pipe is too short. Whomsoever designed this, should keep at least 2 m of pipe, this one was just 1 meter. U will have to purchase the pipe from outside if distance is over 1 meter ....Overall good product, but my preferance would be to not rely on Amazon installation and directly book from Bosch.

I wish I had replaced my old I** washing machine which used to shake my entire building and super sonic sound. In contrast, this 7 Kg fully automatic washing machine from Bosch is a sheer joy. I don't even know whether clothes are being washed even while sitting at a distance of 3 meters. I was apprehensive to order on Amazon as I thought that it is I who will have to contact Bosch for the installation. However, on the contrary, I got a call from Bosch on the very next day of the delivery. The service engineer asked me whether I had water connection? I sent him photograph of the existing water point. He asked me to get a 0.5 inch to 0.75 inch adapter. I requested him to get it himself. He came installed the machine and provided demo. So, delivery to installation  in 2 days. EXTREMELY HAPPY TO HAVE BOUGHT THIS MACHINE. Just go for it. Bosch is a great company.
